detail_desc: Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood, wind flap with buttons and a concealed zip. Side pockets, one inner pocket and an adjustable vent with a concealed button at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with a round neckline. Ribbed trim around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.

Dress in airy crêpe with sparkly stone details. Narrow cut at the top with a fastening at the back of the neck and an open section and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short butterfly sleeves with overlocked hems.

Padded ski mittens in functional fabric with embossed rubber on the palms, and elastication and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.
Clutch bag in sturdy imitation leather with a beaded strap at the front. Flap with a magnetic fastener, metal-chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x14x21 cm.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide, foldover edge at the waist and soft, narrow elastic trims at round the legs.

Microfibre shaping briefs that hold in and shape the waist. High waist with elastication and a concealed silicone trim. Folded, glued seams around the leg openings for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with a mesh detail and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Regular Fit.
Short, gently fitted skirt in a textured bouclé weave. High waist with decorative metal buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains has small round pendants and the other has one large pendant. Adjustable length 40-47.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Platform sandals in suede with a braided jute trim, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and wedge heels. Rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Metal studs in the shape of gift bows.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a brushed finish.
Cardigan in a loose bouclé knit with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and front patch pockets. No buttons.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt.
Metal rings in various designs.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Long sleeves with gathers and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short skirt woven in a modal blend with a grosgrain trim in a contrasting colour. Concealed zip in the side and a sewn-in belt at the front with D-rings. Unlined.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, drawstring at the top, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Brushed inside.
Suede boots with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Gently fitted, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, padded, hood with a faux fur trim. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal, zipped pockets, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a crinkled weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and on the skirt. Jersey lining.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in jersey crêpe. High waist with inset covered elastication at the front, a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.

Biker jacket in slightly stretchy twill made from a cotton blend. Notch lapels with a decorative metal button, a diagonal zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a decorative tab and metal press-stud at the sides. Lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in a textured knit with wide, covered elastication at the waist and a jersey underskirt.

Lightweight trenchcoat in a crisp weave with a stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a detachable, adjustable strap at the cuffs, a detachable belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Unlined.
Short dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and long sleeves that are puffed at the shoulders. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.
Straight-cut dress in a patterned weave with short sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey made from a viscose blend with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with smocking and a flounce.
Jumper knitted in soft velour yarn in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Short faux fur jacket with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hair decoration of plastic-coated metal wire decorated with fabric flowers and leaves in shimmering imitation leather.
Blouse in patterned cotton chambray with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flounced trim at the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a skirt in a double layer of glittery tulle.
Sleeveless, circular dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a decorative bow at the front and gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional yarn with elasticated tops.

Microfibre body with a gently sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Non-wired, mesh-lined lace cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and glued hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with press-studs.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.
Short, halterneck dress in viscose jersey. Narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.

Shopper in grained imitation leather with matching clutch. Shopper with two shoulder straps with metal decorations, a magnetic fastener at the top and a zip in the side to adjust the size. Clutch with a zip at the top. Unlined. Size of shopper 16x32.5x37 cm, size of clutch 22x32cm.
Ankle boots in grained leather with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated hem.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and slim, tapered legs.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a Tencel™ and modal weave with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist, a cut-out section with covered elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
